Мастер фраза для определения максимально: Well, that old thing almost tore me to pieces for its g
Better than on the roof. What did I miss?
dialogs_chapter_12_Ничего особенного. По:
Nothing special. While you were resting, Purgatory was 
brought back to a more or less normal state. The corpses 
of the Risen were removed, the barrier is working again 
and there are no traces of adamant anywhere.
dialogs_chapter_12_Жаль, что погибших не:
It's a shame that the dead can't be brought back. 
The ranks of the reapers have been greatly reduced in 
such a short time, and we won't recover from this anytime 
soon.
dialogs_chapter_12_Чем планируешь занять: What are you planning to do?
dialogs_chapter_12_Меня леди Лаурита по: I will run errands for Lady Laurita until the next expedition.
dialogs_chapter_12_Очень далеко, куда ра: Very far, where we have not gone before - to the Forgotten City.
Rita\..\..\.. No. It is suicide for you to go to such a place.
dialogs_chapter_12_Этот город находится:
This city is deep underground, such creatures live there\..\..\.. 
This is only on the way to the city. I'm afraid to imagine what is 
in the city itself.
dialogs_chapter_12_А что я могу сделать?: What can I do? This is an order from Lady Death.
dialogs_chapter_12_Попрошу, чтобы нас по:
I'll ask that we be switched, let them send you to
something less dangerous, if that's what it takes.
dialogs_chapter_12_В крайнем случае, я у: At worst, I'll tag along after you.
dialogs_chapter_12_До этого момента у на: We have plenty of time until then.
dialogs_chapter_12_Ладно. Ты полностью з: Okay. You're completely healthy and can go.
dialogs_chapter_12_И ещё! Свяжись с Ирее:
And one more thing! Contact Irei, he wanted to tell you about 
a new quest in the world of the Living.
Hm?\..\.. This is\..\..\.. Intensive care. Am I in the medical building?
dialogs_chapter_12_Верно и тебя не без т: True, and they managed to recover you, not without difficulty.
dialogs_chapter_12_Битва с Восставшими е: The battle with the Risen has not yet worn off from my body.
dialogs_chapter_12_Рассказывай. Что у те: Tell me. What's on your mind?
dialogs_chapter_12_Я боюсь будущего. Раз:
I fear the future. If the war with the Risens is only the 
beginning, what awaits us at the end? I barely managed to 
defeat Krieger. What will happen when I meet a more 
serious enemy?
dialogs_chapter_12_Лучшее, что ты можешь:
The best thing you can do is prepare. Haven't you 
mastered the release form yet? Haven't you explored all 
the talents and abilities of the Genom Morkret?
dialogs_chapter_12_Как поправишься, само: Once you get better, it's time to start!
dialogs_chapter_12_Я рассуждала так же,:
I thought the same way when I took the aptitude test to 
advance in rank. If I become a Werolomger, I will have 
to be the best in all of my subordinates.
dialogs_chapter_12_Так и добралась до фо: And so I reached the form of release.
dialogs_chapter_12_Понял-понял, совершен: Got it, got it, improve every day.
dialogs_chapter_12_Все что ты пережил, о:
Everything you've experienced has left an imprint on your 
soul and it will stay with you until the end. 
There's nothing you can do about it.
dialogs_chapter_12_Если тебе станет плох: If you feel bad about yourself\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_12_Так, если ты нормальн: Okay, if you feel okay, you can go.
dialogs_chapter_12_Чуть не забыла, тебе:
I almost forgot, Irey wanted to tell you something regarding 
the next task.
dialogs_chapter_12_Хорошо, сейчас погово: Okay, I'll talk to him now.
dialogs_chapter_12_Хвала создательнице,: Praise the creator, you're alive. How are you feeling?
dialogs_chapter_12_Не очень, но жить буд: Not very well, but I'll live.
dialogs_chapter_12_Прости, что всё так о:
I'm sorry things turned out this way. I never imagined 
that your first task would not be "check the canyon for 
enemies" but "clean up all the mistakes of the past Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_12_Я собирался пойти за:
I was going to follow you to find you, but either Ricard was 
against it, or Death was not eager to help\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_12_Ну так почему не приш: Well then why didn't you come?
dialogs_chapter_12_Законы и правила. Я н:
Laws and rules. I didn't want to give Ricard a reason to blame 
me for the case\..\..\.. In my life, I have gone against the laws many 
times for the sake of personal ambitions, but the higher I climbed 
up the ladder, the harder it was to answer for everything.
dialogs_chapter_12_Значит положение тебе: So your position is more important to you than your own son?
dialogs_chapter_12_Твоя жизнь дороже люб:
Your life is more valuable than any title or position. But I 
am also responsible for your mother's life. And this 
maniac is waiting for a convenient opportunity to 
eliminate me, Bella\..\..\.. and you.
dialogs_chapter_12_Ты не ответил на глав: You didn't answer the main - the second question.
dialogs_chapter_12_Я хотел осчастливить:
I wanted to make Bella happy. To bring a little light into this 
dark world.
dialogs_chapter_12_Значит моё появление: So my appearance in the "light" was not your initiative.
dialogs_chapter_12_Нет\\..\\..\\.. А с ч: No\..\..\.. Why are you so angry with me?
dialogs_chapter_12_Хе-хе\\..\\..\\.. Я б:
Heh-heh\..\..\.. I would be incredibly happy if, in addition to 
kind words, you helped in battles, and went through 
everything with me.
dialogs_chapter_12_Если бы не наши разго:
If it weren't for our conversations on the radio, I would have 
forgotten about your existence while wandering around the 
canyon.
dialogs_chapter_12_Что было, то было. Ещ:
What's done is done. I say again, I'm sorry it turned out this 
way\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_12_Постой! Ирей. Он хоте:
Wait! Irey. He wanted to talk about Death's upcoming 
mission.
dialogs_chapter_12_Ага. По крайней мере:
Yeah. At least physically. I heard I have a new assignment 
coming up.
dialogs_chapter_12_Ты верно слышал. К та:
You heard correctly. Such a task requires time to prepare, 
so it is not urgent. No one is sending you out of the frying 
pan into the fire.
dialogs_chapter_12_В мире Живых на терри:
In the world of the Living, in the territory of the Holy Roman 
Empire, something terrible is brewing. A demonic invasion.
The Emperor of men somehow managed to anger the Devil 
and now the forces of Hell are gathering an army to strike.
dialogs_chapter_12_Нас это дело тоже кас:
This matter concerns us too. We will need to get into 
the country's territory and find a way to solve this 
problem. And you are one of those we will send there.
dialogs_chapter_12_Что\\..\\..\\.. Как э: What\..\..\.. How is this even possible?! How did people do this?
dialogs_chapter_12_Понимаю Риом, я сам в:
I understand Riom, I'm also\..\..\.. confused, but the fact is the fact.
People have challenged the forces of Hell and you will need to 
save them somehow.
But that's it\..\..\.. For the future. For now, rest, help the 
reapers or finish other things while you have time.
This is a bonus for the work done.
dialogs_chapter_12_*Тяжело вздыхает* Фуу: *Sighs heavily* Phew. Thanks, I think I'll do that.
dialogs_chapter_12_Демоны\\..\\..\\.. Оп:
Demons\..\..\.. The devastators took their rage and brute force 
from them\..\..\.. But he didn't finish the ability to cast spells 
or use artifact weapons.
dialogs_chapter_12_Ладно, после всего пе:
Okay, after everything I've been through, I'm not afraid of 
anyone in this crazy world anymore.
dialogs_chapter_12_Риом берет в руки пир:
Riom picks up the pyrite sword, and then examines
his helmet.
dialogs_chapter_12_Мда уж\\..\\..\\.. Ре:
Yeah, right\..\..\.. You could use some repairs, although I'd 
think about replacing you\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_12_Риом приложил руку к: Riom put his hand to the stove.
dialogs_chapter_12_Кенчиру. Ранг - Ривал:
Kenchiru. Rank - Rivalser, low-ranking reaper. Corps -
reconnaissance. Died in battle with the Risens on the 
territory of the Eastern Canyon.
dialogs_chapter_12_Рита. Ранг - Ривальсе:
Rita. Rank - Rivalser, low-ranking reaper. Corps - medical.
Died in battle with Krieger on the territory of the Eastern
Canyon.
dialogs_chapter_12_Ирни. Ранг - Боевой ж:
Irni. Rank - Combat Reaper. Corps - punitive.
Died in battle with the Risens on the territory of the Eastern
Canyon.
dialogs_chapter_12_Роза. Ранг - Боевой ж:
Rosa. Rank - Combat Reaper. Corps - punitive.
Died in battle with the Risens on the territory of the Eastern
Canyon.
dialogs_chapter_12_Хифлок. Ранг - Боевой:
Hiflok. Rank - Combat Reaper. Corps - punitive.
Died in battle with the Risens on the territory of the Eastern
Canyon.
dialogs_chapter_12_Рутгер. Ранг - Боевой:
Rutger. Rank - Combat Reaper. Corps - punitive.
Killed in battle with the Risens in the Eastern Canyon.
dialogs_chapter_12_Тини. Ранг - Ривальсе:
Tini. Rank - Rivalser, low reaper. Corps - engineering.
Killed in battle with the Devastators in the Western

dialogs_chapter_12_Гасп. Ранг - Боевой ж:
Gasp. Rank - Combat Reaper. Corps - combat reapers.
Killed in battle with the Devastators in the Northern

dialogs_chapter_12_Ильнара. Ранг - Ривал:
Ilnara. Rank - Rivalser, low reaper. Corps - engineering.
Missing in action in the Northwestern Part of the Canyon.
dialogs_chapter_12_Рикард. Ранг - Боевой:
Ricard. Rank - Combat Reaper. Corps - punitive.
Missing in action in the Northern Canyon in the Labyrinth.
dialogs_chapter_12_Клавдий. Ранг - Верол:
Claudius. Rank - Verolomger, high reaper. Corps - combat 
reapers. Missing in action in the Jagged Canyon.
Spotted in the ranks of the Risen. Death not confirmed.
dialogs_chapter_12_Авель. Ранг - Ривальс:
Abel. Rank - Rivalser. Corps - punitive. Killed in the Dark 
Forest. (The entry has not been updated for 500 years.)
dialogs_chapter_12_Кригер. Ранг - Вероло:
Krieger. Rank - Werolomger. Corps - Death's bodyguard.
Missing in action in the Dark Forest, tens of thousands 
of kilometers from Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_12_Иногда я думаю, что в:
Sometimes I think that all of this is just a dream. 
A very long, drawn-out nightmare.
dialogs_chapter_12_Иногда спрашиваю, зач:
Sometimes I ask, why, Creator, did you create us? 
For what purpose?
dialogs_chapter_12_А в ответ получаю без:
And in response I get a mad grin and a world falling 
apart.
dialogs_chapter_12_Я создан не для того,:
I was not created to save everyone, but only to behold 
the last moment\..\..\.. of everything.
dialogs_chapter_12_И мне не остается нич:
And I have no choice but to smile back at my creator 
and enjoy every moment of the falling castle.
dialogs_chapter_12_Весь наш поход оберну: Our entire expedition ended in disaster.
dialogs_chapter_12_Адамант использовал н: Adamant used us as living puppets and squeezed everything out\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_12_Его свет открыл мне г:
It's light opened my eyes to the horror that lies beyond the 
Abyss\..\..\.. who Death is and why she created the reapers.
dialogs_chapter_12_Если бы Фолтер был бы:
If Folter had been faster, I would have avoided the fight with 
Sidrin. Regained control of my body sooner\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_12_Руки Клавдия начали р: Claudius' hands began to crumble into ashes.
dialogs_chapter_12_Хотел убить меня? Про: You wanted to kill me? I'm sorry. I don't have the strength left for you.
dialogs_chapter_12_Совет Иерархов. Восст:
Council of Hierarchs. The rebels have been destroyed, 
the reapers have coped without us.
dialogs_chapter_12_Он упомянул имя Фолте: He mentioned Folter's name. Pay him a visit?
dialogs_chapter_12_Вам виднее. А что нас: You know best. What about Death? Is she a threat?
dialogs_chapter_12_Не трогать. Понял, зн: Leave her alone. Got it, so the reapers are on their own for now.
Keep an eye on him?\..\.. Okay, whatever you say.
dialogs_chapter_12_Загляни ко мне в комн: Come into my room. I have a very important conversation.
dialogs_chapter_12_Так\\..\\..\\.. О чём: So\..\..\.. What did you want to talk about?
dialogs_chapter_12_О твоём будущем. Ты м:
About your future. You have achieved a lot in a short 
time, I and the other Werolomgers are impressed by 
your results.
dialogs_chapter_12_Одолеть опустошителей:
Defeat the Devastators, Commander Ricard, Nightmare, 
defeat the Risen and pacify the spirit of Genome Morkret\..\..\.. 
and all in a short time.
dialogs_chapter_12_Свои таланты ты доказ:
You have proven your talents and can now claim the title 
of High Reaper.
dialogs_chapter_12_С сегодняшнего дня ты:
From today on, you are my bodyguard and deputy of the 
corps of combat reapers.
dialogs_chapter_12_Спасибо, буду рад слу: Thank you, I will be glad to serve under your command!
dialogs_chapter_12_Раз я теперь твой тел:
Since I'm your bodyguard now, how about a shoulder 
massage?
dialogs_chapter_12_После стольких сражен:
After so many battles, your shoulders must be stiff\..\..\.. 
your back must be tense\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_12_Риом снял с Лауриты т:
Riom removed Laurita's heavy shoulder pads, and 
then her entire set of armor.
dialogs_chapter_12_Риом начал массироват: Riom began massaging the muscles in the neck area.
dialogs_chapter_12_Риом плавно переключи: Riom smoothly moved to the shoulders.
(I wonder\..\..\.. why she's not wearing a bra. Does the 
armor squeeze her breasts too much? Is it comfortable?)
dialogs_chapter_12_Лаурита\\..\\..\\.. С:
Laurita\..\..\.. Tell me, did you walk around without underwear 
all this time?
dialogs_chapter_12_Хи-хи, только сейчас: Hee hee, just now you noticed?
dialogs_chapter_12_Разумеется, я обычно: Of course, I usually wear a bra\..\..\.. it's uncomfortable without it\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_12_Да?.. Тогда мне тоже: Yeah?.. Then I'm curious about something too.
dialogs_chapter_12_Скольким девушкам ты:
How many girls have you massaged before making 
love to them?
dialogs_chapter_12_Если хочешь, чтобы ме:
If you want something to happen between us\..\..\.. it's better
to be honest.
dialogs_chapter_12_Повезло, что жнецы не:
It's lucky that reapers can't have families like humans. 
Otherwise, you'd be in big trouble.
dialogs_chapter_12_Ничего, ты у нас один:
It's okay, you're the only one like this. But don't get 
distracted, continue\..\..\.. and by the way, it's not just my 
shoulders that are tense.
dialogs_chapter_12_Риом не спеша обхвати: Riom slowly grabbed Laurita's breast and began to massage it.
dialogs_chapter_12_(Значит чутье меня не:
(So my instincts were right. She didn't call me to talk 
about a promotion, it was a pretext.)
dialogs_chapter_12_(Те с кем я спал. Я н:
(The ones I slept with. I didn't have any serious feelings 
for them. Just lust. Is that what you want, Laurita?)
dialogs_chapter_12_Риом сжал грудь сильн:
Riom squeezed the breasts harder and began to 
massage the nipples with his fingers.
dialogs_chapter_12_Движение рук Риома ст: Riom's hand movements became more lustful.
dialogs_chapter_12_Плохо же ты на меня в: You're such a bad influence on me\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_12_Пускай это останется: Let this remain our little secret.
dialogs_chapter_12_И обещай, что впредь:
And promise that from now on you will only do 
“massages” with me.
dialogs_chapter_12_Поздравляем, жнец, с:
Congratulations, reaper, on completing Mask of Dead 2:
Shadow Of Pelagius! It was a long and difficult journey,
but you made it.
dialogs_chapter_12_В будущем мы планируе:
In the future, we are planning a major gameplay 
update that will add the ability to freely move 
around the world without being tied to the plot, 
after an extra scene.
dialogs_chapter_12_А пока что на этом вс:
And that's all for now. Support us on itch.io and ask 
questions there, we'll be happy to answer and discuss 
anything you're interested in about the game!
dialogs_chapter_12_Риом! Как ты себя чув: Riom! How are you feeling? Are you fully recovered yet?
dialogs_chapter_12_Пока что свободен. А: I'm free for now. What's on your mind?
dialogs_chapter_12_Нет, правда. Что ты х: No, really. What do you want? I can't read minds.
dialogs_chapter_12_Пойдем вместе на прос:
Let's go on a simple errand together, and after that I'll 
show you an interesting place, near the sea.
dialogs_chapter_12_Пошли. Надеюсь там ни: Let's go. I hope no one will bother us there.
dialogs_chapter_12_Риом с Ритой покидают:
Riom and Rita leave Purgatory, taking on a mission in the 
human world.
dialogs_chapter_12_И так\\..\\..\\.. Рит:
So\..\..\.. Rita seems to have sorted out her soul. We should 
hurry, before Headquarters starts worrying about us\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_12_Ну что, старик, остав:
Well, old man, leave all your regrets behind, your time 
has come.
dialogs_chapter_12_Риом положил руку на:
Riom placed his hand on the old man's forehead and 
slowly began to pull the soul out of the body.
dialogs_chapter_12_Как только душа полно:
Once the soul was completely separated from the body,
the reaper unsheathed the histite sword.
dialogs_chapter_12_Через секунду душа че:
A second later, the man's soul was absorbed and sent to 
Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_12_Успел. Теперь ни одна:
I made it. Now no creature will take you for themselves\..\..\..
especially a demon.
dialogs_chapter_12_Что такое? Обманули ч:
What's wrong? You deceived a man, he didn't fulfill the 
conditions, you marked him with a mark and were ready 
to snatch him from the general flow of souls\..\..\.. and 
then - a bummer. Death reacted faster.
dialogs_chapter_12_Где бы ты не прятался:
Wherever you're hiding, you better leave while you still 
have something to do it with.
dialogs_chapter_12_Я закончила со своим: I'm done with my assignment. How are you?
dialogs_chapter_12_Порядок, но я был бли:
It's okay, but I was close to\..\..\.. an incident. The man was 
marked by a demon, but everything turned out okay.
dialogs_chapter_12_Хорошо раз так. Я сей: Okay then. I'll come to you now.
dialogs_chapter_12_Теперь обещание. Прид:
Now a promise. I'll have to walk to the island on the opposite
continent.
dialogs_chapter_12_Без телепорта это зай: Without teleportation, it will take weeks or months\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_12_Да, а теперь держись,: Yeah, now hold on as tight as you can.
dialogs_chapter_12_Храни нас Смерть\\..\:
Death protect us\..\..\.. Just don't tell me that your shadow 
step can accelerate to supersonic speed\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_12_Я чуть душу по дороге: I almost lost my soul on the way\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_12_Буду рада, если ты ещ:
I'll be glad if you carry me a little longer\..\..\.. my legs won't 
obey me.
dialogs_chapter_12_Красиво\\..\\..\\.. я:
Beautiful\..\..\.. I've never seen such flowers\..\..\.. Did you do all 
this yourself?
dialogs_chapter_12_Место очень романтичн:
The place is very romantic and detached from everyone\..\..\.. 
I found it by accident.
dialogs_chapter_12_Постой. Ноги снова сл: Wait. My legs obey me again. Thank you for your help!
dialogs_chapter_12_Так\\..\\..\\.. это в: So\..\..\.. is that all you wanted to show me?..
dialogs_chapter_12_Знаешь же моё прошлое: You know my past\..\..\.. it's dangerous\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_12_Уверен, что хочешь?: Are you sure you want to?
dialogs_chapter_12_Риом заметил странный:
Riom noticed a strange pink symbol on the girl's groin.
A symbol in the shape of an empty heart.
dialogs_chapter_12_Это подарок от той де: Is this a gift from the demoness who taught you healing?
dialogs_chapter_12_Д-даа\\..\\..\\.. Он:
Y-yes\..\..\.. It means\..\..\.. According to her\..\..\.. For complete
satisfaction I need you to fill me completely,
otherwise I won't be able to stop\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_12_(Спасибо всем Высшим:
(Thank you to all the Higher Powers for making me a reaper 
and not a human\..\..\..)
dialogs_chapter_12_Значит, мы тут задерж: So, we'll be staying here at least for the night.
